posts.post_content: Let me be the first to say thanks to Leon for an exclusive T-206 area to play !!

Love it! It was getting rather crowded over in the T Cards section! I think this will help all of us. Not that my approval matters, but great decision Leon, and thank you!

1. The people who avoid T206s
2. The people interested in T206s alone.
3. The people interested in all T Cards!
Now all we need to do is convince Leon to add a separate B/S/T for each T206 Back.... :)
The T-206 section has been only up for a few hours and I probably checked it 10 times already. Thanks Leon!
